title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 19, 2021
description: Today would have been the 80th birthday of Nora Ephron, author of classic movies such as When Harry Met Sally (1989), and Sleepless in Seattle (1993). She said, “Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
